description: Try our easy to follow French Shallot, Chive & Verjuice Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: French Shallot, Chive & Verjuice Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange oysters in the half shell on a platter on a bed of crushed ice or coarse rock salt. Spoon 1 tsp of dressing onto each oyster and top with chopped chives. Serve while the dressing is warm.
